activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12212
activity.text:
hey @Srayash, The issue occurs due to a z-index or pointer-events conflict between the sidebar and the toaster notification. When the sidebar opens, it likely introduces an overlay or element that blocks interaction with the toast. I will resolve this by ensuring the toast container has a higher z-index than the sidebar and that no overlay is intercepting clicks. Iâ€™ll also verify that the toast is rendered outside the sidebar's DOM tree to avoid stacking issues. 

expected time -> 1-2 days(max)

please assign me this issue
